p: Data from the earliest (2011) and most recent survey (2017) with self‐reported use of HIV services were compared over the two years. The outcomes compared were the number of PWID testing HIV+, the number of these that self‐reported HIV+, the number reporting being registered at an AIDS centre, and the number reporting that they receive ART. Tests for differences in the use of services by whether PWID were NGO clients or not were assessed using χ 2 tests.
